snippet: T.J. Oshie scored the only goal in the shootout as St. Louis improved an already impressive record against the Eastern Conference.
abstract: NHL Roundup; St Louis Blues defeat New Jersey Devils, 4-3; other NHL results noted.
lead_paragraph: T.J. Oshie scored the only goal in the shootout as St. Louis improved an already impressive record against the Eastern Conference.

headline.seo: Blues End Devils’ Five-Game Win Streak
headline.main: Elliott and Blues End Devils’ 5-Game Winning Streak
headline.print_headline: Elliott and Blues End Devils’ 5-Game Winning Streak
